comments:
Frequently when I point to a symbol and click for "references"
I get a pop-up: 
   an internal error occurred in "Java Search" 
and the details button is not enabled.
can you look if there's something in the .log file (workspace/.metadata)?

This looks like the relevant complaint:


!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.runtime 4 2 2005-03-29 17:17:27.109
!MESSAGE An internal error occurred during: "Java Search".
!STACK 0
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.core.Assert$AssertionFailedException: Assertion failed;
The source type has an invalid name: commonGame.old

Could you make a try with a more recent build, at least 3.1 M6 or last
integration build?
If this error still occurs then reopen with a detailed test case to reproduce,
thanks

Close as there's now around 2 months without requested info.
Suppose that this problem does no longer occur in 3.1...
